name: Configuration Variable
description: Devfine environment variable such as $PORT to seperate configuration from your codebase.  Useful for configuring database connections for seperate environments (test, staging, production).

name: Dyno
description: An abstract way of refering to the compute resources assigned to your app.  Heroku is a lightweight container-based system, avoiding the need for you to manage and maintain servers.

name: Procfile
description: A simple text file that defines how to run each processes in your Heroku application

name: Process type
description: A process is defined as either a web process that listens to incoming requests, or any other type you wish to define.

name: Slug
description: A bundle of your source, fetched dependencies, the language runtime, and compiled/generated output of the build system, ready for execution
